item.title: CVE-2024-0645|2024-09-10T18:14:36.621Z -- explorerplusplus -- explorer%2B%2B.exe
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in Explorer++ affecting version 1.3.5.531. A local attacker could execute arbitrary code via a long filename argument by monitoring Structured Exception Handler (SEH) records.
